yaml_query:
query:
  dates:
    - from: 2019-01-01
      to: 2024-03-16
  content:
    AND:
      - Nils Fiechter
      - Adrian Spahr
result:
  format: TSV
  maxResults: 10000000
  columns:
    - id
    - pubtime
    - medium_code
    - medium_name
    - rubric
    - regional
    - doctype
    - doctype_description
    - language
    - char_count
    - dateline
    - head
    - subhead
    - content_id
    - content
version: 1.2
